api_key.title: FDA API Key (Optional)
api_key.description: Your FDA API key. Get one at https://open.fda.gov/apis/authentication/. Without a key, you're limited to 240 requests per minute and 1000 requests per day.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Sync data from this date onwards (YYYY-MM-DD format). Leave empty for all available data.

limit_per_request.title: Records Per Request
limit_per_request.description: Number of records to fetch per API request (max 1000)
